product_name: Lakeshore Sunset Cruiser Stand Up Paddleboard - 12' 6"
long_description: Offering flatwater-specific performance with carbon-fiber rails for a little extra speed, the Lakeshore Sunset Cruiser Stand Up Paddleboard quickly covers water on your favorite lake, pond or bay.
short_description: Offering flatwater-specific performance with carbon-fiber rails for a little extra speed, the Lakeshore Sunset Cruiser Stand Up Paddleboard quickly covers water on your favorite lake, pond or bay.
